title: build: linux-arm build failure
body:
I have no clue what happened here:

(This wasn't me messing with the builders)

https://storage.googleapis.com/go-build-log/23a82b32/linux-arm_418c1cc0.log

Any ideas?

/cc @crawshaw @ianlancetaylor @minux @cherrymui @randall77
